title: Trump White House lawyer told key witness to mislead Jan. 6 panel, sources say
description:
• Analysis: The one question the Jan. 6 committee left hanging over America
• LIVE: House panel meets to discuss whether to release Trump's tax returns

title: Hear GOP senator's response to McCarthy's threat over spending bill
description: Republican House leader Rep. Kevin McCarthy has told Senate Republicans that if they vote for the bipartisan omnibus bill any legislation they send to the House will be "dead on arrival" once he becomes speaker.

title: Watch: Truck carrying 134-foot concrete beam demolished by train
description: A train derailed in Tennessee after colliding with a truck that had stopped on the tracks due to a red light at the intersection.  The driver of the truck was not injured.

title: Millions across US under 'bomb cyclone' winter weather alert
description: A fast-approaching arctic blast has put parts of the United States under a winter weather alert, with temperatures expected to drop to 50 degrees below zero in some areas. CNN's meteorologist Derek Van Dam reports.

title: Plans are underway for Zelensky to meet with Biden on Wednesday in what would be his first foreign trip since Russia's war against Ukraine began
description: Planning is under way for President Joe Biden to welcome Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky to the White House on Wednesday in what would be a surprise visit that will coincide with the administration's intent to send the country a new defense assistance package that will include Patriot missile systems, according to two sources familiar with the planning underway.

title: Hear why Musk might be staying silent after Twitter poll
description: CNN media analyst Sara Fischer joins Victor Blackwell to discuss what's next for Elon Musk after the Twitter CEO created a poll asking whether he should "step down as head of Twitter."

title: James Cameron ends 'Titanic' door debate that had Keke Palmer up in arms
description: Director James Cameron put an end to the debate of whether Jack and Rose could have both survived on the floating door at the end of of "Titanic," a controversy that has plagued many, including actress and singer Keke Palmer.

title: House committee meets to discuss whether to release Trump's tax returns
CNN anchor presses ex-US Border Patrol chief about Biden claim
description: CNN's Ana Cabrera speaks with former US Border Patrol Chief Ron Vitiello about the rise in migrant surges at the US-Mexico border and the plan to address them laid out by the Biden administration.

title: Their dog traveled with them to the US border. Then they had to leave her behind
description: CNN's David Culver revisits the journeys of families who have tried seeking asylum in the US the past few months.

title: The best and worst TV endings of 2022, from 'Better Call Saul' to 'Killing Eve'
description: To win a gold medal in Olympic sports like diving or gymnastics, the key last step is to stick the landing. That's also true for TV series, which, however popular they might have been at their apex, can leave a sour aftertaste if they mess up their finales.

title: Taliban suspend university education for women in Afghanistan
Calls for UK newspaper to sanction Jeremy Clarkson over 'violent misogynist' Meghan article
description: A group of British lawmakers are calling for action to be taken against columnist Jeremy Clarkson after he wrote a "violent misogynist" opinion piece about Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex in the Sun newspaper, which was later retracted.

title: Taliban suspend university education for women in Afghanistan
description: The Taliban government in Afghanistan has suspended university education for all female students in the country, a spokesman for the Afghan Ministry of Higher Education confirmed to CNN.

title: Tom Cruise one-ups himself with new daring stunt
description: Tom Cruise does another do-it-himself movie stunt and this one is a doozy. CNN's Jeanne Moos has the behind-the-scenes video.

title: 3 suicides in 1 week on same aircraft carrier were unrelated, Navy investigation finds
description: A US Navy investigation found that three suicides within one week in April among the crew of an aircraft carrier in Newport News, Virginia, were "not related or connected."

title: EU accepts Amazon commitments in antitrust agreement affecting data and sellers
description: The European Union has struck a deal with Amazon that will resolve multiple antitrust investigations into the company and impose binding restrictions on the e-commerce giant's business, in another major step by EU officials to rein in Big Tech.

title: These natural wonders aren't US national parks. But they should be
description: "National parks are the best idea we ever had," declared American writer and environmentalist Wallace Stegner. And like many great inventions, the park system became wildly popular.

title: Biden administration gears up for end of Trump-era border restriction as Supreme Court considers whether to keep it in place
What these Impressionist paintings reveal about breastfeeding in the 19th century
description: The history of breastfeeding reveals uncomfortable truths about women, work and money. An unlikely place where the history of nursing is clearly visible is in Impressionist paintings.

title: As Twitter backlash grows, rival Mastodon reaches 2.5 million monthly users
description: Twitter rival Mastodon has grown eight times its size in a matter of weeks, going from approximately 300,000 users in October to 2.5 million in November, according to a blog post by the platform's founder, Eugen Rochko.

title: Wells Fargo ordered to pay $3.7 billion for 'illegal activity' including unjust foreclosures and vehicle repossessions
description: Federal regulators fined Wells Fargo $1.7 billion on Tuesday for "widespread mismanagement" over multiple years that harmed over 16 million consumer accounts.

title: EPA finalizes tougher pollution standards for large vehicles like trucks and buses
description: The Biden administration on Tuesday finalized tougher pollution standards for heavy-duty vehicles like large trucks, delivery vans and buses starting with model year 2027.

title: Justin Bieber slams H&M for their Bieber collection
description: Justin Bieber is not a fan of some H&M merchandise bearing his image.

title: The Black Death's legacy, Neanderthal family ties, and other secrets revealed by ancient DNA in 2022
description: The fast-expanding field of ancient DNA, formally known as paleogenetics, came of age in 2022, earning its pioneering scientist Svante Pääbo a Nobel prize for medicine and physiology.

title: Man arrested for allegedly vandalizing menorah with a Nazi symbol in California
description: A man was arrested after he allegedly vandalized a menorah in California and carved a Nazi symbol into its base, the Beverly Hills Police Department said in a news release.

title: 3M will stop making hazardous 'forever chemicals' starting in 2025
description: 3M, the conglomerate behind Post-It notes and Scotch tape, will stop making controversial per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) by the end of 2025.

title: Haberman: People are sick of running to defend Trump
description: CNN political analyst Maggie Haberman shares her takeaways from the latest January 6 committee meeting with CNN's Don Lemon and Kaitlan Collins.

title: Harry and Meghan's next Netflix docuseries will drop on New Year's Eve
description: Netflix has announced its next project with Prince Harry and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex -- a Nelson Mandela-inspired docuseries titled "Live to Lead."

title: Uncovering the Veterans Affairs scandal, CNN's Drew Griffin helped ordinary people find the courage to right wrongs
description: In 2014, Drew Griffin, our beloved CNN colleague who passed away this weekend, met with arguably the most important source for one of his most groundbreaking stories in a seedy bar in Phoenix.

title: US to send precision bomb kits and Patriot missiles in next Ukraine aid package, officials say
description: The US is expected to send Ukraine precision bomb kits that will turn existing unguided munitions, or "dumb" bombs, into precision-guided "smart" bombs known as Joint Direct Attack Munitions, or JDAMs, according to multiple US officials.

title: TikTok is removing some of the mystery behind how it recommends videos to users
description: If you've ever wondered why TikTok suggested a certain video in your feed, you may start to get a little more clarity.

title: Russia has shouted about escalation long enough
Brooklyn hospital network reverts to paper charts for weeks after cyberattack
description: A network of three hospitals in Brooklyn, New York, has had to work off paper charts for weeks following a cyberattack on its computer systems in late November, the hospital group's chief executive told CNN Monday.

title: On Snake Island, the rocky Black Sea outcrop that became a Ukraine war legend
description: Snake Island has a special place in Ukraine's folklore, now more than ever. Its defiant defense -- when a Russian warship was famously told to "go f*** yourself" -- and then reconquest rallied a nation in the early months of the conflict with Russia, puncturing the myth of the invaders' superiority.

title: Intruder able to enter Uvalde school during safety audit, superintendent says
description: While conducting a safety audit of schools in Uvalde, Texas, an inspector posing as an intruder was able to gain access to a school cafeteria through a door that did not properly lock, the school district's superintendent said at a school board meeting Monday.

title: Main Street's buying stocks while Wall Street sells: What gives?
description: It's been a rollercoaster year for stocks. The S&P 500 is down more than 20% year-to-date and 2022 is likely to end up as the sixth-most volatile year since the Great Depression.

title: Luka Dončić and Mavericks head coach Jason Kidd ejected from loss as Dallas' struggles continue
description: Dallas Mavericks star Luka Dončić and head coach Jason Kidd were both ejected from its 116-106 loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves on Monday as the team's underwhelming season continues.

title: CNN returns to infamous Snake Island. See what we found
description: At the start of the war, as Russian troops attempted to take over Snake Island in the Black Sea, Ukrainian troops fired back the now infamous retort: 'Russian warship, go f**k yourself." CNN's Will Ripley returned to Snake Island to see what has happened to this strategically significant location in the Russia-Ukraine war.

title: Opinion: Indicting Trump would be incredibly controversial, but it may be the only remedy
description: After more than a year of digging through evidence to understand what happened on one of the darkest days in American history, the House January 6 committee has issued its findings: Former President Donald Trump aided an insurrection and should be charged with multiple felonies.

title: The fateful question the January 6 committee left hanging over the United States
6.4 magnitude earthquake reported in Humboldt County, California
description: A 6.4 magnitude earthquake was detected about 7.5 miles west-southwest of Ferndale, California, in Humboldt County, according to the US Geological Survey.

title: 97-year-old former Nazi secretary sentenced for involvement in more than 10,000 murders
description: A 97-year-old former secretary at a Nazi concentration camp has been convicted for her role in the murder of 10,505 people during the Holocaust, in what could be the final trial of its kind.

title: Jordan Spieth on the joy of trash-talking Tiger Woods
description: It's one of sport's most unfamiliar sights -- Tiger Woods standing idly by as his opponents are crowned winners.

title: First images of British banknotes featuring King Charles III unveiled
description: The first images of banknotes featuring Britain's King Charles III were unveiled on Tuesday by the Bank of England.

title: World Cup champion Argentina returns home to a jubilant Buenos Aires
Moscow says it shot down 4 US-made missiles over Russia
description: • Video: What Putin wants from visit to Belarus

title: Paddle board teens 'miraculously' rescued after drifting miles in strong winds
description: Four teenagers were "miraculously" found alive on an island in southwestern Australia Tuesday after drifting overnight in choppy waters for about 30 kilometers (19 miles), authorities said.

title: Why this has been a culturally unique World Cup
description: This was never going to be a traditional World Cup.

title: I reported on 30 elections this year. This is what I learned
description: Liberal democracy was hanging on by a thread this year across the world as nations ranging in size from France to the Faroe Islands went to the polls to choose who would rule them. All too often, though, voters demonstrated a sharp turn to the right or, having little free choice, merely cemented in power ancestral dictators.

title: Los Angeles Rams: Defending Super Bowl champion officially eliminated from playoff contention after defeat in freezing conditions
description: Defending Super Bowl champion the Los Angeles Rams were officially eliminated from playoff contention after losing to the Green Bay Packers 24-12 on a bitterly cold evening in Wisconsin on Monday.

title: Bayern Munich denounces racial abuse directed toward Kingsley Coman after France's World Cup final defeat
description: Bayern Munich has denounced the racial abuse directed toward French player Kingsley Coman following France's World Cup final defeat on Sunday.

title: Why an Abu Dhabi startup wants to send quinoa seeds into space
description: With the climate crisis making many food crops more difficult to grow, some scientists and entrepreneurs are searching for solutions beyond our planet.

title: Don't send Grandma to the ICU this Christmas
description: It started with one person releasing a long, productive unmasked cough into the stale, recycled air on the rush hour train.

title: Arrest made in 'sextortion' case police link to teen's suicide
description: Police in California have arrested a suspect in connection with an alleged online scam authorities said led to the suicide death of a 17-year-old boy in February.

title: Russia has shouted about escalation long enough
description: Almost 10 months into Russia's full-scale invasion, the vital battle for the future of Ukraine is not on the front line.

title: North Korea ready to prove ICBM progress by firing at normal trajectory, Kim's sister claims
description: North Korea is ready to test-fire an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) at a normal trajectory, leader Kim Jong Un's sister said Tuesday in state media, a flight pattern that could prove the weapons can threaten the continental United States.

title: Polar air and a powerful winter storm put millions under winter alerts this holiday week
description: For millions of Americans across a large swath of the country, the holiday week is beginning with unrelenting below-freezing temperatures made even more miserable by heavy snow expected Tuesday and Wednesday in several central and northwestern states.

title: Moscow says it shot down 4 US-made missiles over southern Russia
See Messi and triumphant teammates arrive in Argentina
description: The airplane carrying Argentina's World Cup-winning squad arrived in a jubilant Buenos Aires, as the the country holds a national holiday to welcome home captain Lionel Messi and the triumphant team.

title: World Cup champion Argentina returns home to a jubilant Buenos Aires
description: The airplane carrying Argentina's World Cup-winning squad arrived in a jubilant Buenos Aires in the early hours of Tuesday morning, as the the country holds a national holiday to welcome home captain Lionel Messi and the triumphant team.

title: Lula da Silva made a historic comeback. He now faces a divided Brazil as president
description: The mood is hostile at an encampment outside a military barracks in Brazil's most populous city of Sao Paulo, where Brazil's national anthem plays on a loop and dozens of supporters of President Jair Bolsonaro mill around. They tote placards that read: "SOS Armed Forces," "military intervention with Bolsonaro in power," and "save us from communism."

title: The fateful question the Jan. 6 committee left hanging over the US
description: • Opinion: Trump represents our founders' worst fears

title: British Airways flights from the US delayed due to technical difficulties
description: British Airways flights from the United States were delayed Monday night due to technical difficulties.

title: Researchers discover over 100 new ancient designs in Peru's Nazca lines
description: More than a hundred new designs discovered in and around Peru's ancient Nazca plain and surrounding areas could bring new information to light about the mysterious pre-Columbian artworks that have intrigued scientists and visitors for decades.

title: Jake Tapper pays tribute to Drew Griffin
description: Jake Tapper remembers the life and legacy of his colleague Drew Griffin, a dedicated CNN investigative reporter who died after a long battle with cancer, his family said. He was 60.

title: Ex-Pence adviser says this prompted Pence's Trump investigation comments
description: Former Homeland Security and Counterterrorism adviser to Vice President Mike Pence, Olivia Troye, joins CNN's Jake Tapper to discuss Pence's recent comments about the January 6 committee investigation into former President Donald Trump.

title: Elon Musk is conspicuously quiet after Twitter users vote for him to step down
description: Is Elon Musk resigning as "chief Twit" or not?

title: What the criminal referrals against Trump mean
Mystery shrouds Putin's rare visit to Belarus
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made a rare visit to neighboring Belarus as Ukraine says it fears a full-scale invasion from Belarus is imminent. CNN's Nick Paton Walsh reports.

title: Terry Hall, lead vocalist of Ska band The Specials, has died
description: Terry Hall, lead singer of the English 2 tone and ska revival band The Specials, has died.

title: Russia and China unite for live-fire naval exercises in waters near Japan
description: China and Russia will begin a weeklong joint live-fire naval exercise in the East China Sea on Wednesday, the Russian Defense Ministry said in a statement, as the two partners step up cooperation in an increasingly tense western Pacific.

title: Indonesia president supports plan to scale back troops in restive Papua
description: Indonesian President Joko Widodo said on Monday he supports plans to scale back the presence of troops in the eastern region of Papua, where the country's military has been accused of human rights abuses in tackling a long-running independence movement.

title: Trump posts response to January 6 criminal referrals
description: Former Trump White House press secretary Stephanie Grisham reacts to former President Donald Trump's post in the wake of the criminal referrals made by the January 6 committee to the Department of Justice.

title: Streaming wars give boost to gaming sector
description: Video games have already outpaced the music and movie sectors -- and just like those industries, streaming may hold the key to its future.

title: Skier survives after being carried 500 yards by an avalanche near Jackson Hole in Wyoming
description: A skier was rescued on Friday in Teton County, Wyoming, near Jackson Hole after getting caught in an avalanche and carried about 500 yards.

title: Why Argentina's win over France was the greatest World Cup final ever
description: It seems only yesterday that Enner Valencia was swatting aside Qatar in the 2022 World Cup's curtain raiser.
